channel.title: flashQ Blog
channel.description: Tutorials, guides, and insights about job queues, AI pipelines, and background processing.

item.title: flashQ in Action: Live Demo of All Features
item.description: Interactive walkthrough: priorities, retries, DLQ, rate limiting, cron jobs, workflows, and real-time monitoring.

item.title: flashQ Architecture: How We Built a 1.9M Jobs/sec Queue Server
item.description: Deep dive into flashQ's sharded design, lock-free data structures, and optimizations that achieve 1.9M jobs/sec.

item.title: How to Rate Limit OpenAI API Calls with flashQ
item.description: Learn how to properly rate limit OpenAI, Anthropic, and other AI API calls. Avoid 429 errors and control costs.

item.title: Job Queue Patterns for AI Applications
item.description: Essential patterns for building reliable AI applications: fan-out, sagas, circuit breakers, and more.

item.title: Building AI Pipelines with flashQ: A Complete Guide
item.description: Learn how to build production-ready RAG pipelines, LLM workflows, and batch inference systems using flashQ.

item.title: flashQ vs BullMQ: Why We Built a Redis-Free Alternative
item.description: A detailed comparison between flashQ and BullMQ. Learn when to use each and why going Redis-free matters.

item.title: Monitoring AI Pipelines: Metrics, Alerts, and Dashboards
item.description: Set up comprehensive monitoring for your AI pipelines with Prometheus, Grafana, and flashQ metrics.

item.title: What is flashQ? A Modern Job Queue for AI Workloads
item.description: Discover why we built flashQ, a high-performance job queue designed specifically for AI and ML workloads. No Redis required.
